name: Wyvern Joust DEMO
description:
Demo version of Wyvern Joust
2 players - 3 stages

Gamepad strongly recommended!!

otherwise:

1st player = WASD, "F": attack, "G": Fly, "H": Special Power
2nd Player=  Arrows, "M": attack, ",": Fly, ".": Special Power

If there's no 2nd Player you only can play 1 minute practice
Up/Down at wyvern selection screen to select color.

Eat Humans for POWER!

Compete for 5 or 10 kills. Eat humans to gain power. Roast birds for extra power.

Full version soon to come out. Please send your opinion or bug reports =O)

CREDITS

Graphics, design and programming: MacDoom
Music: Aquatarkuss
